abstract: Some banks' online application processes aren't as seamless as they should be, according to a new Javelin research report.
snippet: Some banks' online application processes aren't as seamless as they should be, according to a new Javelin research report.
lead_paragraph: If you've ever tried - and failed - to open and fund an online checking account, you're not alone. A new report from Javelin Strategy & Research finds that only a little more than half of consumers who try to do so are successful.

headline.main: Online Account Opening Isn't as Easy as It Looks
